Articles.Content:
well i am in progress of making Jeb and the others but they all look the same so....

the thing i need to know is if the textures used for the helmet and spacesuit is available or not.

And if not can be made available...

well i give you a print scr of the progress so far and it\'s completely colorless for the time being(i don\'t want to render him just yet cause my computer sucks :\'()

Try smoothing the forehead so it looks less like a green propane tank, the top of the head seems to just \'drop off\' to the face

Other than that its awesome and better than anything i could do

Make his head into an SRB and put it into the game

I should tell you, the image you have causes an alert from avast antivirus, saying that the website hosting the image is trying to load malware onto my computer. You might want to consider finding a different host.

No more complaints!

Anyways, nice work on the model.
